text: Alireza Soleimani Karbalaei (, 2 February 1956 - 21 May 2014) was an Iranian super heavyweight freestyle wrestler. He was the first and the only Iranian, to this day, to win the gold medal in the Superheavy Weight of Freestyle Wrestling. He won the medal at the World Championship 1989. He was born in Tehran, Iran. Soleimani died from a heart attack, aged 58. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography Category:1956 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Iranian wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Tehran
title: Alireza Soleimani
